suggestion.play_card_reason: The best move is to play the {{cardName}} {{reason}}.

reason.see_opponent: to see what the opponent plays without risking a good card.
reason.win_round_cheap: to win the round as cheaply as possible.
reason.discard_low: because we can't win this trick, it's better to save the others.
reason.parda_y_canto: to tie, hide our strongest card, and then call Truco.
reason.probe_low_value: to hide your strength and see what the opponent plays.
reason.probe_mid_value: to look credible and bait the opponent into a mistake.
reason.bait_lopsided_hand: to set a trap and maximize Envido points, as your hand is weak for Truco.
reason.feint_pre_truco: to hide your incredibly strong hand and bait the AI into calling Truco or bluffing.
reason.feint_active_truco: to appear weak and bait the AI into raising the bet, as your hand is very strong.
reason.play_last_card: because it's the only card left.

suggestion.respond_quiero_envido_good: We have {{points}} points. The AI called, but our chances of winning are good. We should accept with 'I want it'.
suggestion.respond_quiero_envido_bluff: We have {{points}} points. It's risky, but the AI might be bluffing. We can say 'I want it' to see their cards.
suggestion.respond_quiero_envido_default: The AI challenges us, and we have {{points}} points. The recommendation is to accept.
suggestion.respond_quiero_truco_solid: Our hand is good enough to compete. We should accept the Truco challenge with 'I want it'.
suggestion.respond_quiero_truco_bluff: Even though our hand isn't great, the AI could be lying. Accept with 'I want it' to call their bluff.
suggestion.respond_quiero_truco_default: The AI raised the bet. The suggestion is to accept the challenge.
suggestion.respond_no_quiero_envido_risk: We have {{points}} points, but the AI called strongly, and they likely have more. The safest move is to fold.
suggestion.respond_no_quiero_envido_default: Our {{points}} envido points probably aren't enough. It's better to fold to avoid losing points.
suggestion.respond_no_quiero_truco_weak: Our hand is too weak for this challenge. The best play is to fold with 'I don't want it' to minimize point loss.
suggestion.respond_no_quiero_truco_default: The AI raised the bet and we don't have the cards to compete. It's better to fold.
suggestion.respond_escalate_truco_strong: Our hand is excellent! The AI called Truco, but we can raise the bet to '{{call}}' because we have a great chance of winning.
suggestion.respond_escalate_truco_bluff: We're in a bad spot, but we can try a risky bluff. Raise the bet to '{{call}}' to see if we can make the AI fold.
suggestion.respond_escalate_truco_default: We have a very strong hand. This is a good time to respond to the AI's Truco with a '{{call}}'.
suggestion.respond_envido_primero_bluff: The AI called Truco, but we can interrupt with '{{call}}'. Even though our {{points}} points are low, it's a good bluff.
suggestion.respond_envido_primero: {{context}}the AI called Truco. We have {{points}} for envido ({{strengthText}}), so we should interrupt with '{{call}}' to claim those points.
suggestion.respond_escalate_envido: We have {{points}} points, {{strengthText}}! The AI thinks it has a good hand, but ours is superior. We should raise the bet with '{{call}}'.
suggestion.respond_escalate_envido_default: We have {{points}} points ({{strengthText}}). The suggestion is to respond to the AI's 'Envido' by raising to '{{call}}'.
suggestion.proactive_truco_bluff: Our hand is weak, but we can try a bluff by calling '{{call}}'.{{alternative}}
suggestion.proactive_truco_strong: We have a very strong hand! It's the perfect time to call '{{call}}' and increase the round's value.{{alternative}}
suggestion.proactive_truco_parda: Key play! First trick was a tie. Win this, and you win the round. Calling 'Truco' is a risk-free move: if they fold, you get 1 point. If they accept, you win 2!
suggestion.proactive_envido_bluff: We only have {{points}} envido points, which is low. However, {{opponentInfo}} We can try a bluff by calling '{{call}}'.{{alternative}}
suggestion.proactive_envido_bluff_opponent_info: the AI has a {{rate}}% chance of folding.
suggestion.proactive_envido_strong: We have {{points}} for envido! That's {{strengthText}}, we should call '{{call}}'.
